placeDesc: Bahnhof is one of Sweden’s largest internet service providers. When CEO Jon Karlung secured a former nuclear bunker below 100 feet of Stockholm bedrock as the site for a data center, he thought it would be appropriate to bring his love of 1970s sci-fi to the design of the place.Pionen (taken from its Cold War code name) is a server housing center that can withstand a hydrogen bomb. If the power goes out, back-up is provided by a couple of German submarine engines. False waterfalls, indoor jungle plants, low-lying fog, and a conference room with an image of the moon’s surface on the floor complete the desired effect of super villain dream pad.
placeShortDesc: The internet as provided by a James Bond villain.
placeNearby: Abandoned Eriksdal Train Tunnel,Stomatol Sign,Katarina Elevator
placeRelatedPlaces: Levon's Divine Underground,Casa de Piedra (Stone House),Ajanta Caves,Kariz-e-Kish
